definition: page of a publication (e.g. newspaper or website)/printing space (reserved for some content)/page layout
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Jam-packing a blog layout with too many things.
sentences.chinese: 用過多的東西過度包裝博客版面。

sentences.english: After that, and for the next three years, he effectively annexed the back pages.
sentences.chinese: 在那之後的三年裏，他穩穩地佔據着體育版面。

sentences.english: Added a countdown timer to campaign mission start.
sentences.chinese: 爲戰役開始版面增設倒時器。

sentences.english: The layout of books and periodicals is essential to the binding design.
sentences.chinese: 書刊的版面設計，是裝幀設計的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Despite the print size, though, this is a valuable little book.
sentences.chinese: 儘管這本書版面太小，但它的確是一本很有價值的書。

sentences.english: Layout analysis is the foundation of engineering drawing recognition.
sentences.chinese: 工程圖版面分析是實現自動讀圖的前提。

sentences.english: They need someone with experience of making up a page.
sentences.chinese: 他們需要一個有編排版面經驗的人。

sentences.english: In general, vertical layout encourages users to scroll down.
sentences.chinese: 總的來說，垂直的版面會刺激顧客往下滾動頁面。

sentences.english: The letters were fixed together to make a page of print.
sentences.chinese: 這些字體拼湊在一齊可以印刷一版面。

sentences.english: The newspapers once again filled their columns with salacious details.
sentences.chinese: 赤裸裸的猥褻細節再度充斥了報紙的版面。

sentences.english: Each panel has on its reverse side the royal monogram of the Dowager Empress.
sentences.chinese: 每個版面背面有太后的皇家會標。

sentences.english: Chapter IV introduced the "Qilu Evening News" community news layout planning.
sentences.chinese: 第四章介紹了《齊魯晚報》社區新聞的版面策劃。

sentences.english: You must provide mockups during bidding process through.
sentences.chinese: 你必須提供在招標過程中，通過版面編排。

sentences.english: It occupies half a page - five times more space than the text of the story.
sentences.chinese: 它佔用了一半版面，是文本的的五倍空間。

sentences.english: We put these two articles in the added layout.
sentences.chinese: 我們把這兩篇文章安排在增編的版面裏。

sentences.english: The young have also come to dislike newspapers' clutter.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，年輕人也不喜歡報紙雜亂的版面。

definition: to carry a story/to publish (in a newspaper or magazine)
Toutiao, personalized content recommendation app (abbr. for 今日頭條|今日头条[Jin1 ri4 Tou2 tiao2])
to log out (computer)/to publish/to be published/to appear (in a newspaper etc)
